entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 12:58 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
